name: Pixel Chopper
description:
Small project I made during a Udemy Class, I like to take the general idea of whatever course I am learning and bend it heavily from simple lesson and into a full game. This is one of the games that came out of it.

I hope you will partake in a few rounds of this simple little game. It was fun to work and but it's time to pack it in and begin work on my other projects again!

Big thanks to Kenny.nl, RoleMusic, and the Godot Engine!
